title: M-Cell re-report
body: Found the [REDACTED] along the stream; mf got wings this time instead of just scuttering around. Idk if agent Marcus has updated you about the brain containers, but R&D finally found a hard limit wrt the range: up to 200 miles with the one we got. Obv we're getting the short end of the stick here, but I assume DG got some plans to clean up the deal later down the line. For now, proceed with the set-up clean-up as usual.    P/s: contact D-cell when you can; they need a temp agent.    - YKMG

title: the Thing(tm)
body: Oh, another thing (ha) about what we've found along the stream. You remember the black slime from operation Mound? Yeah, we found another one here as well. Seemed to have eaten a few passerbys; lots of vacationing hunters this time of year ig. We managed to free the half digested corpses if nothing else (burning the mf works as usual) but it fled before we could do anymore more damage. Chances are it's being raised by [REDACTED] so it's not like we could do much anyway.    Just wanted to give you a head's up in case you get sent to do field work.    - YKMG

title: Audio review
body: A-Cell want you to check this out. Think they were on edge because of the surrounded sound.  <audio controls src='config/network/fbi.gov/tpa.mp3'>    -----    Audio transcript follow:    -----    Hi, um, I-I-I-I don’t have a whole lot of- of time. Um, and, and… oh man, I don’t know where to start. They’re-they’re-they’re, uh, they’re-, they’re-, um, they’ll triangulate on this position [Ruby, Alaska] really really soon, um.    Okay, um, um, okay, what- what we think of their… uh, they’re, they’re extra-dimensional beings [COMMENT REDACTED] that... an earlier precursor of the... [previous agent from DG?] made contact with… Uh, they-they are not what they claim to be. Uh, they have infiltrated a lot of, uh, a-a-a lot of aspect of-of-of... [ - the government, definitely at least a friendly ally]    uh, di- disasters that are coming. They, uh, they’re, uh- I’m sorry...    -----​    Transcript end.    -----    Email the report back to your contact in Alaska (the newer contact btw.)    - Akeley

title: New Mission
body: Terminate agent Cayden at your earliest convinient.
